parameters.name: data_provider_global_metastore_id
parameters.description: If not provided, all providers will be returned. If no providers exist with this ID, no results will be returned.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of providers to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: The provider list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of available authentication providers. The caller must either be a metastore admin or the owner of the providers. Providers not owned by the caller are not included in the response. There is no guarantee of a specific ordering of the elements in the array.
